name: Rx Game
description:
Rx Game is inspired by the creators day job of being a pharmacy technician. The player's objective is to fill prescriptions in a timely manner with a twist. 

The player will be tasked with completing one of the many mini games Rx Game has to offer, including games like Catch-A-Tab, Capsule Crashers, and more...

The game is in active development for both PC and iOS (maybe Android at some point.) 

Feedback on the development and ideas for improvement are definitely encouraged and, at the least, appreciated.
